name: MedAISure Core
description: Core benchmark dataset registry entry aggregating 200 tasks across Diagnostics, Summarization, and Communication.

name: MedAISure Hard (Planned)
description: Planned dataset for challenging, adversarial, or edge diagnostic cases.

name: MedAISure Specialty (Planned)
description: Planned dataset for specialty subdomains (e.g., cardiology, radiology).

name: MedAISure Multimodal (Planned)
description: Planned dataset for multimodal tasks (text + images).
